name: Planet Evolve
description:
Become a real cell trying to evolve into something really large, important… and cruel! Yep, only here you may feel like a cell roaming through the large planet and eating everything on its way to survive and evolve! Check our new amazing Planet Evolve game and be ready for your ultimate evolution adventure quest!

Planet Evolve features:
• Interesting cell surviving quest game
• The wide range of awesome power-ups
• Membranes, cilia, biting stomach, toxic poison and even more
• A chance to evolve into something really different
• Exciting battle missions
• Earth animals as the main rivals
• Colorful graphics and intuitive controls

Catch the luck by its tail and become the best cell ever playing this ultimate Planet Evolve game and evolve into something really special!
